name: SK Mainul Islam
body:
### About me
I am a MS Scholar at the [Department of Computer Science and Engineering](http://cse.iitkgp.ac.in/), [Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur](http://iitkgp.ac.in/) starting from January, 2019. I am working under the supervision of [Prof. Sourangshu Bhattacharya](http://cse.iitkgp.ac.in/~sourangshu/) . My research interest lies in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Data Mining, analysis of Online Social Network(OSN). I am a part of [Complex Network Group](http://www.cnergres.iitkgp.ac.in/).

### Academic Details
I have received my B.Tech in Computer Science and Eng. from [St. Thomas' College of Engineering & Technology, Kolkata](http://www.stcet.org/), India in the year of 2018.

### Support or Contact
Email Address: mainulislam79[AT]gmail[DOT]com
